channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description:
Trying to make a runescape private server, client, source, no-ip, and i portfowarded and everything but m freind still cant connect....it keeps saying error connecting to server. I can connect using 127.0.0.1, but nobody else can connect using the ip....which is 1000arrows.no-ip.org. In fact, i tried registering it on moparscape serverstatus page, but i cant because i says its offline.....but no-ip, and the source is up and running at this very moment! and im on it right now using 127.0.0.1. PLEASE HELP ME, I HAVE A DEADLINE TO GET IT UP, I WAS UP ALL NIGHT AND STILL HAVENT FOUND A SOLUTION!!
PS im using my neighbors router to connect to the internet.....i already have permission from them to portfoward, so i did....but its still not working!!!please help me!
